original_text: So ride your horses quickly into the battle! Drive your chariots as fast as they will go! Tell your soldiers to march forward into the battle. Send your soldiers of Ethiopia and Libya who carry shields. Send your soldiers of Lydia who have bows and arrows. So ride your horses quickly into the battle!
korean_text: 말들아 달려라 병거들아 정신 없이 달려라 용사여 나오라 방패 잡은 구스 사람과 붓 사람과 활을 당기는 루딤 사람이여 나올지니라 하거니와

sentences.original_text: So ride your horses quickly into the battle!
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 말을 빨리 타고 전투로 나아가라!

sentences.original_text: Drive your chariots as fast as they will go!
Tell your soldiers to march forward into the battle.
Send your soldiers of Ethiopia and Libya who carry shields.
sentences.korean_translation: 방패를 든 에티오피아와 리비아 군인들을 보내라.

sentences.original_text: Send your soldiers of Lydia who have bows and arrows.
sentences.korean_translation: 활과 화살을 가진 리디아 군인들을 보내라.

sentences.original_text: So ride your horses quickly into the battle!
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 말을 빨리 타고 전투로 나아가라!
